name: Tech N01
description:
A 2D Rhythm Puzzler where you play as Tech N01 a small factory bot, When your system update corrupts, you find yourself able to hear music, you move your body to the rhythm and try to find a way out of the factory!

Best played with music on :)

This is a game for the 3nd Vaultacular Game Jam hosted by WhiteVault
And The Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Limitations:
Brackeys: Let there be Chaos! - Chaos mode, controls are flipped at random intervals and rhythm timing is out (I'm sorry)
VaultJam: Change the world before the world changes you. - Upload your firmware to the server and turn all machines into BoogieBots!

Controls:  (No Mouse)

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys.

Accept: Enter, E
Open Menu / Escape: Escape, Backspace. Q

Game Design, Programming, Art
Zemeck
